美心脏病学期刊发表研究：丹参注射液对心衰可能存在作用 本帖最后由 aiplus 于 2019-8-6 20:39 编辑
In a nationally representative sample of patients hospitalized with acute HF in China, three fourths received TCM. Nearly all hospitals used TCM, although use varied substantially by hospital. Although TCM was not used in lieu of evidence‐based therapies for HF, we found a signal for harm with the most commonly used TCM.
近期，《美国心脏协会杂志》发表了一项针对中国 PEACE急性心衰研究的分析，结果显示，我国10004例急性心衰患者中，74.7%在住院期间接受含中药成分的药物治疗，其中83.3%是静脉注射液。常见的是丹参(51.2%)，其次是三七(17.1%)、银杏(9.7%)、黄芪(7.4%)和红花(6.3%)。近1/4(24.2%)患者接受至少2种中药成分的治疗，其中以丹参+三七(8.2%)或丹参+黄芪(4.4%)为主
https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/full/10.1161/JAHA.119.012776

JollytheJoker 发表于 2019-8-6 10:23
In‐patient bleeding (OR, 1.39; 95% CI, 1.03–1.88) and mortality (OR, 1.36; 95% CI, 1.04–1.79) wer ...
We observed a significant increase in the risk for bleeding (OR, 1.39; 95% CI, 1.03–1.88) and death (OR, 1.36; 95% CI, 1.04–1.79) during hospitalization with Salvia miltiorrhiza (Table S2, Figure S2). The risk of bleeding was significantly higher in patients who received at least 2 days of Salvia miltiorrhiza therapy (Table S3). The risk of death was significantly higher in patients receiving Salvia miltiorrhiza for up to 9 days; however, mortality was not significantly higher in patients who received >9 days of Salvia miltiorrhiza therapy. In addition, the use of antiplatelets or anticoagulants with and without Salvia miltiorrhiza was not associated with greater in‐hospital bleeding or death
文章的统计结论很微妙呀，<9天提高死亡率，>9天无显著差异，丹参和其他的药一起吃也无显著差异。直接结论是要打就打9天以上或者兑点其他西药 一般来讲就是统计缺乏变量控制带来的奇怪结果。
